sentences.sContent: The ground is covered with moraine.
Our tents were pitched on a sandy moraine shore opposite the massive Blomstrand Glacier – a monster of moving ice that lets out groans and cracks as it calves icebergs into the sea.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our tents were pitched on a sandy moraine shore opposite the massive Blomstrand Glacier – a monster of moving ice that lets out groans and cracks as it calves icebergs into the sea.
sentences.sCn: 我们的帐篷搭在沙石的海岸上，对面是巨大的布鲁姆斯特莱德冰川，这是一块庞大的浮冰，当它的冰山融入海水中时，发出吱吱嘎嘎的声音。

trans.tranOther: a mass of earth or pieces of rock moved along by a  glacier  and left in a line at the bottom of it
